title: 2015 Aston Martin Vantage Roadster GT & 2016 Toyota Tacoma | Watch MotorWeek
text: Join us for some proper British motoring in the Aston Martin V8 Vantage Roadster GT. Pat Goss shows us the dos and donâ€™ts, so we might as well jump. Next, we find that even with hybrids your mileage may vary. Later, we ditch the leftover tacos, and eat up the miles in the all-new Toyota Tacoma.
